original_text: And he called to him his twelve disciples and gave them authority over unclean spirits, to cast them out, and to heal every disease and every affliction.
korean_text: 예수께서 그의 열두 제자를 부르사 더러운 귀신을 쫓아내며 모든 병과 모든 약한 것을 고치는 권능을 주시니라

sentences.original_text: And he called to him his twelve disciples
and gave them authority over unclean spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게 더러운 영들을 다스릴 권세를 주셨다

sentences.original_text: and to heal every disease and every affliction.
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 병과 모든 앓는 것을 고치게 하셨다
